Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: Server
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "Server" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: X-Powered-By
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "X-Powered-By" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: X-AspNet-Version
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "X-AspNet-Version" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: X-AspNetMvc-Version
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "X-AspNetMvc-Version" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: X-Runtime
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "X-Runtime" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: X-Version
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "X-Version" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: HTTP Response Header: Allow
Vulnerability.description: Information Leakage from "Allow" header can give away too much information in operational environments to attackers. Remove this header from your web server.

Vulnerability.title: Enable X-XSS-Protection Header
Vulnerability.description: This header enables the Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter in your browser. Set X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
